title: Engr Software Design
description: Object-oriented software methods for engineering applications.  Numerical analysis methods; simulations and graphical presentation of simulation results; analysis of numerical precision.  Programming projects.  Credit not allowed for both ECE 2036 and ECE 3090.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
